name: Wizard vs Orc Zombies (Classic)
description:
LEFT mouse button shoots MISSILE
RIGHT mouse button shoots FIREBALL



Wizard vs Orc Zombies is the result of my first contact with Construct 3. As you can see it's very raw in terms of graphics, and the code is also very simple. My excuse is that I was aiming for a retro feel, like the early Atari games. Afterwards, instead of improving WvsOZ, I decided to keep it this way and start a sequel from scratch. It feels more like a heavy revamp than a sequel, really, and you can play it here.
